Class PenguinPawPatrol

java.lang.Object
PenguinPawPatrol
public class PenguinPawPatrol extends Object
This class demonstrates the manage of the whole simulation program.

  • Constructor Details

    • PenguinPawPatrol

      public PenguinPawPatrol()
      Default constructor for the PenguinPawPatrol class. Initializes empty arraylists for foxes, sharks, cats, and penguin families, and sets the number of dogs to -1 to indicate an unspecified value.

    • PenguinPawPatrol

      public PenguinPawPatrol(ArrayList<Fox> foxArrayList, ArrayList<Shark> sharkArrayList, ArrayList<Cat> catArrayList, ArrayList<PenguinFamily> penguinFamilyNumberArrayList, int numberOfDogs)
      Parameterized constructor for the PenguinPawPatrol class. Initializes the paw patrol with the provided lists of foxes, sharks, cats, penguin families, and the specified number of dogs.
      Parameters:
      foxArrayList - List of Fox objects in the paw patrol.
      sharkArrayList - List of Shark objects in the paw patrol.
      catArrayList - List of Cat objects in the paw patrol.
      penguinFamilyNumberArrayList - List of PenguinFamily objects in the paw patrol.
      numberOfDogs - The number of dogs present in the paw patrol.

    • cleanNoParents

      public void cleanNoParents()
      This method will change all the chicks and eggs' life status to false if there parents already dead.

    • display

      public void display()
      This method will display this class's summary.

    • displayWelcomeMessage

      public void displayWelcomeMessage()
      This method will dispaly the welcome message.

    • eatenByCat

      public void eatenByCat()
      Simulates penguin members of the paw patrol being eaten by cats. The method iterates through each penguin family and cat in the paw patrol, checks if the cat can eat any penguins or chicks, and updates their life status accordingly. If a cat successfully eats a penguin or chick, their life status is set to dead.

    • eatenByFox

      public void eatenByFox()
      Simulates penguin members of the paw patrol being eaten by foxes. The method iterates through each penguin family and fox in the paw patrol, checks if the fox can eat any penguins or chicks, and updates their life status accordingly. If a fox successfully eats a penguin or chick or egg, their life status is set to dead.

    • eatenByShark

      public void eatenByShark()
      Simulates penguin members of the paw patrol being eaten by sharks. The method iterates through each penguin family and shark in the paw patrol, checks if the shark can eat any penguins or chicks, and updates their life status accordingly. If a shark successfully eats a penguin, their life status is set to dead.

    • endOfSummary

      public void endOfSummary()
      The method shows the end of simulation messages of the whole processing.

    • writeFile

      public void writeFile(double[] fileContent) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      This method will charge for write the result to the new file it will call FileIO class for further action.
      Parameters:
      fileContent - This double array will contain the simulation results.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If happens when the method cannot find out the specified file.
      IOException - It appears when reading the file and an I/O error happens
